body:
Dear Parent,
Thank you for your interest in Alemeno. We are giving finishing touches to our solution. You will get a free trial when we are ready
We are a team of professionals guided by pediatricians and child psychologists. We have helped hundreds of parents inculcate healthy eating habits in their kids. We are on a mission to create a generation of healthy kids.
If you would like a FREE consultation call from our team with regard to the eating habits of your kids, please fill up this form http://www.alemeno.com/general/survey{}.

Thanks
Team Alemeno
